Privacy Policy

updated Oct.1.2021
Itera Network takes your privacy seriously. To better protect your privacy Itera Network provide this privacy policy notice explaining the way your personal information is collected and used.
Collection of Routine Information
This Itera Network website or Itera Network Apps track basic information about their visitors or users. This information includes, but is not limited to, IP addresses, browser or apps details, timestamps and referring pages. None of this information can personally identify specific visitors" or users to this website or apps. The information is tracked for routine administration and maintenance purposes.
Cookies
Where necessary, this Itera Network website or apps uses cookies to store information about a visitor’s preferences and history in order to better serve the visitor or user and/or present the visitor or user with customized content.
Advertisement and Other Third Parties
Advertising partners and other third parties may use cookies, scripts and/or web beacons to track visitors or user activities on this Itera Network website or apps in order to display advertisements and other useful information. Such tracking is done directly by the third parties through their own servers and is subject to their own privacy policies. This Itera Network website or app has no access or control over these cookies, scripts and/or web beacons that may be used by third parties. Learn how to opt out of Google’s cookie usage.
Links to Third Party Websites
Itera Network have included links on this Itera Network website or apps for your use and reference. Itera Network are not responsible for the privacy policies on these websites. You should be aware that the privacy policies of these websites may differ from Itera Network own.
Security
The security of your personal information is important to Itera Network, but remember that no method of transmission over the Internet, or method of electronic storage, is 100% secure. While Itera Network strive to use commercially acceptable means to protect your personal information, Itera Network cannot guarantee its absolute security.
Changes To This Privacy Policy
This Privacy Policy is effective as of Jan 1, 2022 and will remain in effect except with respect to any changes in its provisions in the future, which will be in effect immediately after being posted on this page.
Itera Network reserve the right to update or change Itera Network Privacy Policy at any time and you should check this Privacy Policy periodically. If Itera Network make any material changes to this Privacy Policy, Itera Network will notify you either through the email address you have provided to Itera Network, or by placing a prominent notice on Itera Network Itera Network website or apps.
Contact Information
For any questions or concerns regarding the privacy policy, please send Itera Network an email address info at domain itera.one.
